courses.title: Never Trust Fire
courses.description:
We are happy to share that PPKKL (Pertubuhan Pencegah Kebakaran Kuala Lumpur), NGO society under registered in www.ros.gov.my, will be coming to do a short training session on Fire, its dangers and how to manage it. 
Topics :-
·  Back draft​- The silent killer
·  The usage of elevator during fire
·  Fire demonstration & experiment on 9 Volt batteries that may cause fire. 
·  Vehicles on fire 
·  Study cases & Question & Answer ​

courses.title: PMS Training (for Non-Managers)
courses.description:
Understand the key components of PMS Cycle and best practices in PMS. 
Understand and apply key skills in setting individual goals (KRAs and KPIs) and Key Job Competencies (KJCs) required in the PMS. 
Apply KPI setting in ensuring expectations of performance are objectively set and measured so as to provide better clarity for better performance outcomes.

courses.title: AI Digital Marketing Workshop
courses.description:
Date : 24 Oct 17
Time : 9.30am-12.30pm
Detail : Learn from actual case studies on how some have increased ROI of online ads while reducing costs at the same time
Learn about the latest technology on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and behavioural marketing. Discover how it is changing the future of digital marketing
Know how getting the right audience targeting with accurate demographics and interest helps lower your ads cost
Keep up on how marketing automation solutions today can minimize time spent, manual work and assumptions
Find out how to have better conversion rates with less cost by introducing AI to analyze data

courses.title: Node.js Tutorial For Absolute Beginners
courses.description:
Learn how asynchronous code works in Node and the Node event loop, as well as how to use the event emitter, streams, buffers, pipes, and work with files. We'll see how that leads to building a web server in Node.
We'll dive into web sites, web apps and APIs with Express and learn how Express can save us time as Node developers.
Gain a deep understanding of the JavaScript concepts and other computer science concepts that power Node.

courses.title: Udemy: MongoDB Essentials - Complete MongoDB Guidelines
courses.description:
Deeply understand how MongoDB works - cursor, batch size, iterator
Launch production database on the Atlas MongoDB - managed cloud-based MongoDB database
Install and configure production MongoDB on the dedicated or virtual private server
Understand and use different MongoDB BSON types - ObjectId, ISODate, NumberInt etc.
Learn how to use MongoDB Shell, Robo 3T (Robomongo), MongoDB Compass for database management
